title: MediaTek debuts Dimensity 8000 series for premium 5G smartphones
content:
Although MediaTek’s flagship Dimensity 9000 SoC is yet to make its way into consumers’ hands, the company has already released two more chipsets for premium 5G smartphones. Built on TSMC’s 5nm production process, the all-new Dimensity 8000 and Dimensity 8100 feature octa-core CPUs and borrow several premium features from the Dimensity 9000. The new chipsets

The post MediaTek debuts Dimensity 8000 series for premium 5G smartphones appeared first on xda-developers.
description: MediaTek today released two new SoCs as part of its Dimensity lineup of 5G chipsets -- the Dimensity 8000 and Dimensity 8100. Read on to learn more.
